GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v5.10.140
GSD.description:
NFSv4.2 fix problems with __nfs42_ssc_open

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.140 by commit 5e49ea099850feadcbf33c74b4f514a3e8049b91, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit ec4b0925089826af45e99cdf78a8ac84c1d005f1. For more details please see the references link.
